alert.note: Alert for Logan; Sherman; Thomas; Wallace (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 31 at 4:44PM CDT until August 31 at 5:30PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Goodland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Wallace County in west central Kansas... Thomas County in northwestern Kansas... Northwestern Logan County in west central Kansas... Sherman County in northwestern Kansas... * Until 430 PM MDT/530 PM CDT/. * At 343 PM MDT/443 PM CDT/, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles southeast of Goodland, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...60 mph wind gust reported at Goodland, Kansas. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Winona. This includes Interstate 70 in Kansas between mile markers 11 and 61. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. This thunderstorm will produce damaging winds resulting in areas of near zero visibility in blowing dirt. Use extreme caution if you must travel and be alert for rapidly changing visibility. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to near zero visibility. Be alert for rapidly lowering visibility.
